title: wrong behavior of deleted folders whose name include special characters
body:
### expected behaviour
when you delete a folder with special characters that contain another subfolder if you go to delete files you could see the folder and the sudfolder properly

### actual behaviour 
when you delete a folder with special characters that contain another subfolder if you go to delete files you couldn't see the subfolder properly

### steps to reproduce
1. log in the enterprise version 
2. delete a folder with special characters that contain a subfolder (something like: @#a / a / b )
3. go to delete files
4. click on the folder @#a 
5. the folder  "a" is shown (as expected) click on it
6. weâ´d expect to see "b", but nothing is shown (see attached imaged)

### server configuration
{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.12","version string":"5.0.7 enterprise rc1","edition":"enterprise"}
sql lite

### client configuration
browser: ff,safari, chrome and ie9

operating system:mac 10.8.3

### logs
#### web server error log
